page.title: J J Helps Boost Blue Chips
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. blue chips rose on Thursday, boosted by Johnson Johnson <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JNJ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JNJ.N</A> following its move to buy Guidant Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=GDT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">GDT.N</A>, but market gains were limited after Goldman Sachs posted disappointing revenues.
